name: @ficusjs/renderers
description: Minified ES module renderers for FicusJS

scripts.build:htm: rollup -i src/htm.mjs -o dist/htm.mjs -f es -m -p "alias={entries:{'./constants.mjs':'./constants-mini.mjs'}}" -p "commonjs={}" -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:htm-preact: rollup -i src/htm-preact.mjs -o dist/htm-preact.mjs -f es -m -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:uhtml: rollup -i src/uhtml.mjs -o dist/uhtml.mjs -f es -m -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:lit-html: rollup -i src/lit-html.mjs -o dist/lit-html.mjs -f es -m -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"
scripts.build:css: rollup -i src/css.mjs -o dist/css.mjs -f es -m -p "node-resolve={}" -p "terser={mangle: { keep_fnames: true, toplevel: true, module: true }}" -p "filesize={}"

author: Matt Levy
